alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued June 25 at 6:46PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 10 PM SST... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rainfall. Any additional rainfall will increase the chance of landslides. WHERE...Tutuila, Aunu`u, and Manu`a. WHEN...Through 10 PM SST. IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Flood Watch remains in effect through Sunday as a trough lingers over American Samoa. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 646 AFIAFI ASO TOANA`I IUNI 25 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 10 I LE AFIAFI NEI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa. O nisi timuga e toe toulu o le a tele ai le avanoa e mafai ona tutupu ai sologa mai mauga ma nofoaga a`afia gofie. NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunu`u, ma Manu`a. TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 10 i le afiafi nei. AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono tutupu sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le palapala ua iai nei. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...E tumau le Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa e oo i le Aso Sa ona o uiga louloua o le tau o lo`o i luga o le atunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
